layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x338
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x338
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x322
      LayoutBlockFlow (anonymous) at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 500x19
          text run at (0,0) width 500: "Will be green if the relative positioned table cell properly acts as a containing block."

        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 300x300
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,100) size 300x100
layer at (109,129) size 100x100
